description:
An extension that allows 2D maps to be rendered in 3D by raycasting. This is done by having many rays sent from the player on a small 2D map sent around them which then works out the distance of the wall to the player. This is then rendered by a shape painter which uses the distances and two objects to work out where to start and where to end rendering.

To use

Create a player, raycast and wall sprite.
Set the player's sprite behavior.
Create a shape painter and set its behavior.
Create a small 2D map either inside the screen or outside of it. Walls should use the wall behavior and the player should use the player behavior.

Note - Player and raycast sprites should be 1 by 1 in terms of resolution.
name: RayCast3D
shortDescription: An extension that allows 2D maps to be rendered in 3D by raycasting.

eventsFunctions.description: Control how fast the player moves.
eventsFunctions.name: Speed
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the players speed to _PARAM1_ and their turn speed to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Either start rendering the map, or refresh the rendered scene.
eventsFunctions.name: Render
eventsFunctions.sentence: Render the map using _PARAM1_ as walls, _PARAM2_ as the player and _PARAM3_ as the shape painter and _PARAM4_ as the raycast.

eventsFunctions.description: Change the distance the lines are drawn from each other.
eventsFunctions.name: LineDistance
eventsFunctions.sentence: Rendered lines are set to be drawn _PARAM1_px apart.

eventsFunctions.description: Choose if the player can go through walls or not.
eventsFunctions.name: Collision

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: This is a representation of the players position on the 2D map.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: PlayerBehavior

eventsFunctions.description: Moves the player to the right.
eventsFunctions.name: Right

eventsFunctions.description: Moves the player to the left.
eventsFunctions.name: Left

eventsFunctions.description: Turn the player to the right.
eventsFunctions.name: RightTurn

eventsFunctions.description: Turn the player to the left.
eventsFunctions.name: LeftTurn

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: This will set the object to be the renderer for the 3D scene.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: DrawBehavior

eventsFunctions.description: Changes how large the rendered lines are.
eventsFunctions.name: LineSize

eventsFunctions.description: Change how high and how low a rendered wall can be rendered.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set Rendered Walls Highest and Lowest Positions
eventsFunctions.name: WallHeights
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set walls highest point to _PARAM3_ and the lowest point to _PARAM2_ for _PARAM0_
